body:
We've collected some of the best new animated websites found around the web.

Check them out if you're looking for a fresh dose of creativity!

## [Umami Ware](http://umami-ware.com/)

![Umami Ware Landing Page](/images/uploads/umami.jpg)

## [Talormade](https://talormade.no/)

![Talormade Landing Page](/images/uploads/talormade.jpg)

## [Spotify Pet Playlists](https://pets.byspotify.com/)

![Spotify Pet Playlists Landing Page](/images/uploads/pets-byspotif.jpg)

## [Erika Senft Miller](https://www.erikasenftmiller.com/)

![Erika Senft Miller Landing Page](/images/uploads/erika-senft-miller-website.jpg)

## [Mirage Festival](https://www.miragefestival.com/)

![Mirage Festival Landing Page](/images/uploads/miragefestival.jpg)

## [Pest Stop Boys](https://www.peststopboys.co.uk/)

![Pest Stop Boys Landing Page](/images/uploads/peststopboys-website.jpg)

## [Unspun](http://unspun.ouiwill.com/)

![Unspun Landing Page](/images/uploads/unspun-ouiwill.jpg)

## [Loer Architecten](http://loerarchitecten.com/en)

![Loer Architecten Landing Image](/images/uploads/loer.jpg)

![Sandy Dauneau Landing Page](/images/uploads/sum-sandy.jpg)

## [56K.Cloud](http://56k.studiovoila.com/)

![56K.Cloud Landing Page](/images/uploads/56k-cloud.jpg)

title: Best New Animated Websites [April 2020]
short: A collection of the best new animated websites for your inspiration!
